details.sectionContent: Capturing your imagination and taking it to the new level to discover your goal. Capture the situation around you, make it feel lively and take leap.
Seminar will be conducted. The knowledge on photography art and vlogging  will be presented.
The participants have to click photos according to the theme. Example: Sadness, Hustle, etc.
Participants have to click photos (maximum 6) to describe a situation or a specific story.
Participants have to shoot a 3-4 min. of vlog describing and capturing the atmosphere of Prakarsh and give it an eye catchy title.

On 13th Feb,2019:
  Round 1: EC Seminar Hall @ 10:45 pm
  Round 2: C-301/302 @ 12:45 pm 
On 14th Feb,2019:
  Round 3: C-301/302 @ 10:30 pm
  Round 4: C-301/302 @ 1:15 pm
